author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Automatically resize the Pixel FED buffer used by `SiPixelRawToClusterCUDA` to construct a contiguous copy of the FED data to be copied to the GPU.

The value of the `MaxFEDWords` parameter is not used. It is kept for backwards compatibility with older configurations, but it will not be written to the cfi files and will be ignored if present.

#### PR validation:

Tested on events from run 355872 that would crash with a segmentation fault or raise an exception, because the Pixel had a larger occupancy than expected.
With these changes all crashes disappear.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. 

Backport of #38868 to 12.4.x for data taking.
title: Resize pixel fed buffer
